name: Blink (itch) (kasmeltz, Antgenix, VeryTori, BishopDev)
description: Blink is a top down endless runner where you can "blink" or teleport through obstacles to try to get a highscore. There's also a leaderboard with the top 10 scores in the world for you to try your hand at beating! Made for the Score Space 13 jam.
